New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the joint-fastest to 2000 runs in T20Is
Key Match Events: England successfully chased down 159 to win by four balls to spare
Harry Brook hit a four through the cover region to secure the win
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan batters failed to stitch together enough partnerships
England made a comeback after a strong start by Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam expressed that Pakistan batters need to step up and chip in with consistent performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: Babar Azam scored 31 runs off 24 balls with three fours before getting out to Adil Rashid
Pakistan scored 158 for 7 after being put in to bat first
